{"portraitPath":"Portraits/EyrCott/po_eyrcott_neutral_1","talkerName":"Eyr Cott","line":"Watch out or I'll smoke you... I'm not joking cowboy..."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/EyrCott/po_eyrcott_neutral_1","talkerName":"Eyr Cott","line":"I am the greatest shooter in all of Colorado"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/EyrCott/po_eyrcott_neutral_1","talkerName":"Eyr Cott","line":"I will never give you back your wallet, jerk"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/EyrCott/po_eyrcott_bald_1","talkerName":"Eyr Cott","line":"Damn, it hurts"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/EyrCott/po_eyrcott_bald_1","talkerName":"Eyr Cott","line":"But- Where is the Malteser???"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/EyrCott/po_eyrcott_bald_1","talkerName":"Eyr Cott","line":"I will only face him when he has grown some balls and comes to challenge me himself."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/EyrCott/po_eyrcott_bald_1","talkerName":"Eyr Cott","line":"Now, you know my biggest secret..."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/EyrCott/po_eyrcott_bald_1","talkerName":"Eyr Cott","line":"Here, take back your damn wallet."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/EyrCott/po_eyrcott_bald_1","talkerName":"Eyr Cott","line":"I'm outta here."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"You know how to fight, right?"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"Use <sprite name=move> to navigate and make your decision with <sprite name=select>."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"You can choose to attack, use a skill, or change position. Go ahead! Try it!"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"If you're wondering, I don't need to wait for your turn to end to attack. We can jump on him."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"However, if you eliminate my target before I attack, I won't be able to change targets and I'll waste a turn."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"I'll let you make the decisions, I'm following you! You look strong, so I think you know what you're doing."}

{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"Watch out for your opponent. You don't have to take the hit. You can block with <sprite name=cancel> and only take half the damage!"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"Moreover, if you block at the right moment, you can nullify the damage from the attack and come out unscathed!"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"Use the magnifying glass to observe the enemy, each fighter starts the battle with a recipe."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"If you follow the recipe, each step will make your attack even stronger!"}

{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"But once the recipe is completed, it will be randomly reset. So you have to pay attention to the battle and find the recipe yourself. However, if your focus bar is full, you can analyze the opponent to display their recipe with the magnifying glass."}

{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"Bu- 
 But you're bald too???!"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"Let me join you!"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"You will have to face that cowboy..."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"Do you want me to leave your team?"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/portrait_jimi_3","talkerName":"???","line":"Damn... <waitSec=0.8>I'm mega hungryyyyy!","voiced":"true"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/portrait_jimi_2","talkerName":"???","line":"I need to eat, really... I think there's some cake left, right?","voiced":"true"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/portrait_jimi_6","talkerName":"???","line":"Damn... I'm going to have to make it myself.","voiced":"true"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/portrait_jimi_3","talkerName":"???","line":"It's okay. There should be some ingredients left.","voiced":"true"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/portrait_jimi_5","talkerName":"???","line":"I just need eggs, flour, oil, and cake batter..."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/portrait_jimi_5","talkerName":"???","line":"Alright! Off to the oven!."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/portrait_jimi_5","talkerName":"???","line":"Alright, I've got everything I need! Off to the <color={color_success}>oven</color>!."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/portrait_jimi_2","talkerName":"???","line":"Do I have everything I need?"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/po_jimi_neutral_1","talkerName":"???","line":"Yeah. I should be good."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/portrait_jimi_2","talkerName":"???","line":"No.. I'm missing something..."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/portrait_jimi_2","talkerName":"???","line":"Hmm... 300°F for 10 minutes..."}

{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/portrait_jimi_5","talkerName":"???","line":"Dad always tells me to follow the recipe, but...
 I could bake it at 30000°F for 1 second to get my cake as soon as possible."}

{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/portrait_jimi_4","talkerName":"???","line":"Dad is going to kill meeee... I need to call for help..."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/portrait_jimi_3","talkerName":"???","line":"It's 3 AM, nothing is open at this hour. Besides, I should have the ingredients here anyway."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/portrait_jimi_2","talkerName":"???","line":"I shouldn't go there..."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/po_jimi_neutral_1","talkerName":"Jimi","line":"Ah! Of course!"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/po_jimi_neutral_1","talkerName":"Jimi","line":"No thanks. I appreciate it!"}

{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/po_jimi_neutral_1","talkerName":"Jimi","line":"I don't have time."}
